component.text: Enables EIGRP for a specific interface, using 192.168.10.8/30 subnet.
Alternative Network Command Configuration Using a Subnet Mask
Configuring the Network Command and Wildcard Mask

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands:
Configure R3 to enable EIGRP on all interfaces in the following order:
  • Enter router configuration mode using AS 1
  • Enable EIGRP for R3’s 192.168.1.0/24 network without using a wildcard mask
  • Enable EIGRP for R3’s 192.168.10.4/30 network using a wildcard mask
  • Enable EIGRP for R3’s 192.168.10.8/30 network using a wildcard mask

command.deviceresponse: *Feb 28 20:47:22.695: %DUAL-5-NBRCHANGE: EIGRP-IPv4 1: Neighbor 192.168.10.5 (Serial0/0/0) is up: new adjacency

command.instruction: You successfully configured the network command and wildcard mask.
